title: Freedom to read
creator_credit: Julian Roffman, Erik Barnouw and Center for Mass Communication of Columbia University
brief_description: A discussion film dealing with the problem of censorship as it affects the public library. Dramatized incidents are used in presenting opposing points of view and in raising questions regarding the role of the Library in a democratic country.
creator_credit_for_label: Julian Roffman, Erik Barnouw and Center for Mass Communication of Columbia University
